transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have wheels and a steering wheel.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 You can ride in me with your family.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and an engine.
☁️ You can travel to far away places in me.
🌞 I fly above the clouds.

transport.question: I go chugga chugga choo choo! What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I run on tracks.
📣 I have a whistle.
💺 Lots of people can ride on me.

transport.question: I float on water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't have wheels.
⚓️ I can be big or small.
🐳 Fish swim beside me.

transport.question: I carry lots of things and am bigger than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry boxes.
🚚 I have big wheels.
🚧 You see me on the road delivering goods.

transport.question: You ride me with your feet and I have two wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You need to balance on me.
🚦 You can ride me in the park.
👧 You might wear a helmet when riding me.

transport.question: I take lots of people around the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I have many seats.
🛑 I stop to pick people up.
📍 I have a route I follow.

transport.question: I fly around but not as high as a plane and I have a spinning blade. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚨 Sometimes I help people in emergencies.
⬆️ I can go straight up.

transport.question: I take people where they need to go and you pay me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I have a meter to count the cost.
🚖 I am often yellow.
🙋 You can hail me on the street.

transport.question: I go very fast and can fly to the moon! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need a lot of fuel.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I travel into space.

food.question: I am yellow and yummy! Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am a long fruit.
💛 My color is the same as the sun.
🙈 Monkeys go 'oo oo aa aa' for me.

food.question: I am round and orange. Bunnies love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
🐇 Peter Rabbit enjoys me.
💪 Eating me helps you see in the dark!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me in a glass. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am liquid.
🐄 A big animal makes me.
🦴 I help you grow big and strong!

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable.
🟢 I am the color of grass.
🥣 I can be cooked or eaten raw.

food.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a tree. Sometimes, I am baked in a pie. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am a fruit.
🔴 I am the color of a fire truck.
🥧 You can make a yummy dessert with me!

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven and you can make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often sliced.
🌾 I am made from grain.
🥪 You can put peanut butter and jelly on me.

food.question: I'm a yellow fruit that is sour! You can make lemonade with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍋 I am a citrus fruit.
😖 I make a funny face when you eat me plain.
🥤 I taste yummy when you add water and sugar.

food.question: I am long and thin, and you slurp me up with a fork. I am often served with sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am a type of pasta.
🇮🇹 People in Italy love to eat me.
🍅 I taste great with tomato sauce.

food.question: I am a colorful treat that is cold and sweet. I melt in the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a frozen dessert.
🌡️ You must keep me in the freezer.
👅 I come in many flavors like chocolate and vanilla.

food.question: I am crunchy, salty, and come from the ground. People like to put butter on me, or make me into fries. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a vegetable.
🍟 You can make french fries from me.
🧈 I taste good when mashed with butter.
